subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Configuration Problem
author: Elabeth
full_text:
I really think you're overthinking this setup. haha

~Elabeth


On Wed, Aug 13, 2008 at 10:50 AM, Chad Wiggins <cawiggins78@...> wrote:
> Good point. I guess I need to go out and get speakers now, as I have been
> using headphones. Man these things are loud and clear. I just want to share
> them with you guys. I talked to Elvis last night. lol. Man, sounded just
> like him.
>
> ----- Original Message ----
> From: Elabeth <elabeth@...>
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Wednesday, August 13, 2008 11:31:51 AM
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Configuration Problem
>
> I'd hook the 469 to a speaker then hook the mic to the recorder and
> place it to where it can pick up both your voice asking the questions
> and the noise from the speaker. I'm sure there is a more complicated
> way to do it though.
> ~Elabeth
>
